AzureBlade roared defiantly.

AzureBlade: I would have terminated Prime had I not felt some 
sympathy for him in the first place. No... I am Predacon now. That 
is all the explainations that I will offer. Now welcome me, or I 
will challenge you for leadership!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras:
> 
> Hydras roared with fury and tookf off and faced Azure said "New 
> Warrior, Blade???? If I didn't miss understand you once yelled 
that 
> you would put my head a price... and are you sure that I'll said 
> welcome after that????? what I'm sure that it isn't a Prime's 
trap?"
>

angered

He
